about_the_game:
Add our game to your wishlist, it helps us a lot!


THE GAME

Help Dui find his way home in this challenging puzzle-adventure. Fight bosses, discover new abilities, and learn more about this quirky character on your journey home.

FEATURES


  • Challenging Platforming
    Designed around exploring new movement systems to achieve satisfying leaps and bounds across levels.

  • Unlocking Abilities
    As you progress further in the game, Dui discovers new abilities and mechanics that will help him overcome challenges.

  • Player-Centric Controls
    Move across levels with a character that has been tediously designed for fluidity and satisfying physics. You hold the reigns.

  • Puzzle Solving
    Use your skills to overcome platform puzzles.

  • Boss Battles!
    Go head-to-head in intense boss battles, all while unlocking the mysteries behind the history of Dui.


IS THIS GAME FOR YOU?


Dui is a challenging puzzle-adventure, charming platformer, but it's not for everyone. In order to know if Dui is the right game for you, see if you love any of the points down below. (We wont be offended if you don't)

How Many Of these Points Do You Like?

  • Platforming
  • Unlocking Abilities
  • A Short But Charming Game
  • Puzzle Solving
  • Linear story Telling
  • Funny Characters

name: Dui

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: basic
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: basic

short_description: Help Dui find his way home in this challenging puzzle-adventure. Fight bosses, discover new abilities, and learn more about this quirky character on your journey home.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
